mapper.sql: customer_id, customer_sn, name, business, region, type, phone, address, owner, remark, level, importance, status, contacts_json
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM customer
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter.name},'%')
AND customer_sn LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter.customerSn},'%')
AND business LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter.business},'%')
ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT ${page.offset}, ${page.count}
